text: Grammitis recondita is a species of fern in the family Polypodiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== recondita Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Grammitis recondita
